00013 UsageDelegate::UsageDelegate( int usageColumn, QObject *parent /*= 0*/ ):
00014 QStyledItemDelegate(parent), usageColumn_(usageColumn) {
00015 }
00016 
00017 UsageDelegate::~UsageDelegate() {
00018 }

00020 QWidget* UsageDelegate::createEditor(QWidget* parent, 
00021                                                                          const QStyleOptionViewItem&, 
00022                                                                          const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00023 
00024         // if the column is the one specified for usage items 
00025         if (index.column() == usageColumn_) {
00026                 
00027                 QComboBox* combo = new QComboBox(parent);
00028                 combo->addItem(QString("typed"));
00029                 combo->addItem(QString("nontyped"));
00030                 connect(combo, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00031                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00032                 return combo;
00033         }
00034         // if column was not the one for the usage
00035         else {
00036                 
00037                 // use line edit to edit all other columns
00038                 QLineEdit* editor = new QLineEdit(parent);
00039                 connect(editor, SIGNAL(editingFinished()),
00040                         this, SLOT(commitAndCloseEditor()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00041                 return editor;
00042         }
00043 }
00044 
00045 void UsageDelegate::setEditorData( QWidget* editor, 
00046                                                                   const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00047 
00048         // if the column is the one specified for usage
00049         if (index.column() == usageColumn_) {
00050 
00051                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00052                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00053                 
00054                 int comboIndex = combo->findText(text);
00055                 combo->setCurrentIndex(comboIndex);
00056         }
00057 
00058         // if column was some other than usage
00059         else {
00060                 // use the line edit for other columns
00061                 QString text = index.model()->data(index, Qt::DisplayRole).toString();
00062                 QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00063                 lineEdit->setText(text);
00064         }
00065 }
00066 
00067 void UsageDelegate::setModelData( QWidget* editor, QAbstractItemModel* model,
00068                                                                  const QModelIndex& index ) const {
00069 
00070         // if the column is the one specified for usage
00071         if (index.column() == usageColumn_) {
00072 
00073                 QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(editor);
00074                 QString text = combo->currentText();
00075                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00076         }
00077 
00078         // if column was some other than usage
00079         else {
00080                 // get the text from line edit for other columns
00081                 QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(editor);
00082                 QString text = lineEdit->text();
00083                 model->setData(index, text, Qt::EditRole);
00084         }
00085 }
00086 
00087 void UsageDelegate::commitAndCloseEditor() {
00088         
00089         // try to get pointer to editor in both cases
00090         QComboBox* combo = qobject_cast<QComboBox*>(sender());
00091         QLineEdit* lineEdit = qobject_cast<QLineEdit*>(sender());
00092 
00093         // if the editor was combo box
00094         if (combo) {
00095                 emit commitData(combo);
00096                 emit closeEditor(combo);
00097         }
00098 
00099         // if editor was line edit
00100         else {
00101                 emit commitData(lineEdit);
00102                 emit closeEditor(lineEdit);
00103         }
00104 }
